alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 11:09PM CDT until April 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Clayton County in northeastern Iowa... Central Grant County in southwestern Wisconsin... Southern Crawford County in southwestern Wisconsin... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1108 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Farmersburg to near Garnavillo to near Edgewood, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... McGregor and Marquette around 1120 PM CDT. Prairie Du Chien around 1125 PM CDT. Guttenberg and Bloomington around 1130 PM CDT. Cassville around 1135 PM CDT. Boscobel and Fennimore around 1150 PM CDT. Lancaster around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Highway 61 And County T, Giard, Turkey River, Beetown, County Roads K And T, Fairview and Bridgeport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
